mapper.select: SELECT b.bom_no, b.bom_quantity, m.m_name, m.m_info, m.m_stock, p.goods_name, p.goods_standard, p.goods_contents, b.bom_product_no, b.bom_material_no FROM produce_bom b JOIN produce_goods p ON b.bom_product_no = p.goods_no JOIN material m ON b.bom_material_no = m.m_no ORDER BY bom_no DESC
SELECT NVL(MAX(bom_no), 0) + 1 as bom_no FROM produce_bom
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_bom ( bom_no, bom_quantity, bom_product_no, bom_material_no ) VALUES ( #{bomNo}, #{bomQuantity}, #{bomProductNo}, #{bomMaterialNo} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE produce_bom
bom_quantity = #{bomQuantity},
bom_product_no = #{bomProductNo},
bom_material_no = #{bomMaterialNo},
WHERE bom_no = #{bomNo}
